an9.33:1.3: Yattha kama nirujjhanti, ye ca kame nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:1.4: ‘Kattha kama nirujjhanti, ke ca kame nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:1.5: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:1.6: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.33:1.7: Ettha kama nirujjhanti, te ca kame nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:1.8: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:1.9: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:2.1: Yattha vitakkavicara nirujjhanti, ye ca vitakkavicare nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:2.2: ‘Kattha vitakkavicara nirujjhanti, ke ca vitakkavicare nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:2.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:2.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
an9.33:2.5: ettha vitakkavicara nirujjhanti, te ca vitakkavicare nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:2.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:2.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:3.1: Yattha piti nirujjhati, ye ca pitim nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:3.2: ‘Kattha piti nirujjhati, ke ca pitim nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:3.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:3.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
an9.33:3.5: ettha piti nirujjhati, te ca pitim nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:3.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:3.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:4.1: Yattha upekkhasukham nirujjhati, ye ca upekkhasukham nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:4.2: ‘Kattha upekkhasukham nirujjhati, ke ca upekkhasukham nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:4.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:4.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati;
an9.33:4.5: ettha upekkhasukham nirujjhati, te ca upekkhasukham nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:4.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:4.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:5.1: Yattha rupasanna nirujjhati, ye ca rupasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:5.2: ‘Kattha rupasanna nirujjhati, ke ca rupasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:5.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:5.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ananto akasoti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.33:5.5: Ettha rupasanna nirujjhati, te ca rupasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:5.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:5.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:6.1: Yattha akasanancayatanasanna nirujjhati, ye ca akasanancayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:6.2: ‘Kattha akasanancayatanasanna nirujjhati, ke ca akasanancayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:6.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:6.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma anantam vinnananti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.33:6.5: Ettha akasanancayatanasanna nirujjhati, te ca akasanancayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:6.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:6.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:7.1: Yattha vinnanancayatanasanna nirujjhati, ye ca vinnanancayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:7.2: ‘Kattha vinnanancayatanasanna nirujjhati, ke ca vinnanancayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:7.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:7.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma natthi kinciti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.33:7.5: Ettha vinnanancayatanasanna nirujjhati, te ca vinnanancayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:7.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:7.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:8.1: Yattha akincannayatanasanna nirujjhati, ye ca akincannayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:8.2: ‘Kattha akincannayatanasanna nirujjhati, ke ca akincannayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:8.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:8.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.33:8.5: Ettha akincannayatanasanna nirujjhati, te ca akincannayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:8.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:8.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
an9.33:9.1: Yattha nevasannanasannayatanasanna nirujjhati, ye ca nevasannanasannayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti, ‘addha te ayasmanto nicchata nibbuta tinna parangata tadangena’ti vadami.
an9.33:9.2: ‘Kattha nevasannanasannayatanasanna nirujjhati, ke ca nevasannanasannayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti—
an9.33:9.3: ahametam na janami ahametam na passami’ti, iti yo evam vadeyya, so evamassa vacaniyo:
an9.33:9.4: ‘idhavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
an9.33:9.5: Ettha nevasannanasannayatanasanna nirujjhati, te ca nevasannanasannayatanasannam nirodhetva nirodhetva viharanti’ti.
an9.33:9.6: Addha, bhikkhave, asatho amayavi ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinandeyya anumodeyya;
an9.33:9.7: ‘sadhu’ti bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva namassamano panjaliko payirupaseyya.
